patient-database.description: Patient database server for healthcare agents

get_patient.description: Retrieve detailed patient information including medical records

parameters.patient_id: string (required) - Patient ID like P001, P002, etc.

parameters.query: string (optional) - Search term for name, diagnosis, or treatment
parameters.status: string (optional) - Filter by status: active or discharged

examples: search_patients with query: John and status: active

get_statistics.description: Get database statistics and summary information
